entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
